reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater vest's style, with one noting it looks like a Free People piece, and they appreciate its heavy knitted cotton feel. The garment is comfortable and versatile, working well with jeans or leggings and suitable for both casual and dressy occasions. Customers like the wide range of colors available, and one mentions it's particularly flattering with silver hair. While many find it runs slightly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Color, content, and size is great.
items.body: Really like it. Love that it is 100% cotton. The color is deep and lovely. Great fit. Read more
items.author: Belinda King

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SO comfortable.
items.body: The perfect sweater for days when it's not freezing, but not warm, either. This loose sweater is flattering, well made, and has POCKETS. Also covers the chubby bits, and looks fantastic with jeans or leggings. A staple of my winter wardrobe. Highly recommended. Read more
items.author: Book Addict

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars For me it's a 3 star, but it has 4 star potential!
items.body: First, the color is off. I've been looking for plum/eggplant color clothing pieces for fall and winter and by the picture, this looked good. It's actually a lighter purple; it lacks depth and richness. Also, it is very boxy and not the swing style it looks like in the photo. NOW-if you *like* purples (and aren't picky like me) it *is* a nice purple. Not juvenile. Also, not to grey or pink. If you have more of a boxy figure (and aren't a pear like me) there is room in the top for an ample chest and it isn't clingy anywhere. The knit on this is nice and I think it would wash well on delicate. I also think it would hold up well to regular wear and I liked the patch pockets rather than side slit pockets. (I find side slit pockets to be less useful and they bunch up right at my widest point.) Over all, it is a nice piece! It my not be for *me* but it has wonderful potential for others so it got 4 stars. Read more
items.author: KHS93

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars YesNo is a favorite fall brand for me
items.body: One of my favorite cooler weather brands, TesNo has now got 6 items in my closet. I debated on this last season but just didn't want to let go of the money for a style I was not sure of. This year when I saw it reduced I knew it was calling me. Upon arrival I styled it And loved the oversized fit and look. Don't miss out.... YesNo washes well and retains its shape. Read more
items.author: Debbie Pilcher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems very well made
items.body: The color is a true black. Some have said it is NOT 100% cotton and it was a crinkly material. Maybe the manufacturer has changed bc mine IS 100% cotton; very nice weight for us post menopausal women. As far as fit, I am 5’1”, 130 lbs and bought a M, which was the suggested size. After physically measuring the sizes on me as listed in the size chart, I ordered the M. It fits perfectly and is swingy; perfect over leggings. If I went with the large, I think it would have been too big in the chest area and armholes. I do not plan to wash or dry but put in dryer with Dryelle, since it is 100% cotton. Great value! Read more
items.author: Christina L. Lechner

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color Not As Advertised
items.body: This is a nice quality garment. True to size. Nice fit & style. Where I have an issue is the color. I ordered the beautiful ginger which is one of my favorite fall colors. This sleeveless sweater isn't ginger yellow but more like a bright school bus yellow orange. Very ugly color to wear. Fine for a school bus but yuck as a garment. Just my opinion. Disappointed that the photo was edited to appear as what it in fact isn't. I should have know better. When you see a model in the exact same pose but with different color of the exact same garment then it is in fact photo shopped. I love the sweater so I am sending it back for the olive color in hopes that it is closer to the color advertised. Taking one more chance. Read more
items.author: ArtJourney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars FABULOUS!
items.body: The Yesno sweater vest is a lightweight cotton knit with an A-line shape that hangs loosely and drapes beautifully. I wear it over a button up blouse with leggings and boots for the office. It can be worn casually over a long or short- sleeved top and still look cute. It’s comfortable, stylish, and super adorable. I’ve bought two, in a dark grey and purple (which is a dusty purple or plum and thankfully not a bright purple). I have a lot of tunic- length sweater vests, and the Yesno is my favorite. Very well made, held up well in a warm gentle wash and line dry. Fabric spray easily gets any wrinkles out. I will definitely be buying several more, it’s well worth the cost. I’m 5’ 1”, 148lbs hourglass figure, 36D, and for a looser, swing fit I bought size large. Read more
items.author: Delaney

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Provides warmth, comfort, and utility
items.body: I wanted a cotton vest with pockets to throw on at home -- for the express purpose of carrying my phone around while doing chores. This fits the bill perfectly. Is it high style? No. Is it comfortable? Yes. Does it look like the photos? Only if you size up by two sizes! I'm a US 16 and the 3XL gave me the look I wanted. Read more
items.author: B. Young

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wm9 Ginger, Wm9 Camel, Wm9 Purple, Wm9 Red, Wm9 Black, Wm9 Gray, Wm9 Rust, Wm9 Ash Blue, Wm9 Navy Blue, Indigo. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
